hecstatmod 2020.11.14
  • Reference

    Practical driving exam results

    gbdriving.Rd

    These records were extracted from GovUK and cleaned: they give the success rate of practical driving license exams in the United Kingdom in 2018 in 346 driving centers. A total of 761 750 people passed the test, out of 1 663 897 trials

    gbdriving

    Format

    a data frame in long format containing the following variables, grouped by center

    pass

    number of successfull candidates (by sex)

    total

    total number of trials within the center (by sex)

    region

    factor indicating where the exam took place, either Scotland, Wales or one the nine regions of England

    sex

    factor, either man or woman

    Source

    https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/driving-test-statistics-drt
